name: The Green Monk
description:
The Green Monk is a short story for submission to Inkle's game Pendragon. If you want to have at writing your own game for them for yourself the details are here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16ewfjv6ilu8HxQpCa8j8mzORFYjI0XNlDvDln_tDl0o/...

Original photo by Michelle Spencer on Unsplash
